Package com.forsteri.unlimitedfluidity.core.fluidbehaviors.onTouch

Interface IInteractionBehavior<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the return value of the interaction, just a bit of customization
All Superinterfaces:
IFluidBehavior, IInteraction<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
IInteractionWithNeighborBlockUpdateBehavior<T>
public interface IInteractionBehavior<T> extends IInteraction<T>, IFluidBehavior

This interface is where you actually implement the behavior of the fluid.

Since:
2.0
